mapper.select: select t1.*, (select t2.name from sys_menu as t2 where t2.menu_id = t1.parent_id) as parentname from sys_menu as t1
select t1.*, (select t2.name from sys_menu as t2 where t2.menu_id = t1.parent_id) as parentname from sys_menu as t1 where t1.type != 2 order by t1.order_num asc
select * from sys_menu where parent_id=#{parentId} order by order_num asc
